import React, {useState} from 'react' import './MainIntro.scss' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faPlay } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' function MainIntro({mainMovie, currentMovieIndex}) { const [backgroundImage, setBackgroundImage] = useState( movieData && movieData[currentMovieIndex] ? `url(https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500${movieData[currentMovieIndex].poster_path})` : '' ); return (
asdasda
) } export default MainIntro
